txt.en: Deliver Bagnaz Rot-sting's bow to Elgur at Amdân

After encountering the hated Orc-archer, Bagnaz Rot-sting, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

As you inspect Bagnaz Rot-sting's bow, you make note of thirty-two notches carved into it. It seems to mark a count of the dwarves who fell to his poisoned arrows at Azanulbizar. You resolve that Bagnaz's grim tally will never be known to the Orcs of Moria, and that those he slew will be honoured among Durin's Folk.

You decide to bring this trophy to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim, that it might be preserved once the war is ended.

Elgur can be found at Amdân during the Battle of Azanulbizar in T.A. 2799.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe at Azanulbizar. You should deliver it to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim.
After encountering the hated Orc-archer, Bagnaz Rot-sting, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

'What is this?'

Elgur inspects the bow of Bagnaz Rot-sting. After seemingly coming to the same conclusion regarding the thirty-two notches along it, Elgur nods solemnly.

'I see. I have heard much of the silent Orc that has been slaying our kin at Azanulbizar. It eases my mind that he shall trouble us no longer. You have my thanks, Hermáth.'
